lead_paragraph: A close relative of the first victim tested positive for the virus, the authorities said. Health officials had thought the epidemic was over.

headline.print_headline: Africa; Sierra Leone: 2nd Ebola Case Emerges in Quarantine
headline.main: Sierra Leone: 2nd Ebola Case Emerges in Quarantine

snippet: A close relative of the first victim tested positive for the virus, the authorities said. Health officials had thought the epidemic was over.
abstract: Health authorities find another case of Ebola in Sierra Leone, second since officials announced epidemic had ended; is close relative of recently discovered Ebola victim and had been under quarantine.
